Protocols/HashingFunction.html#/s:FP9Cry.name: finishBlock()
Protocols/HashingFunction.html#/s:FP9Cry.abstract: Finishes hashing of all data added with update function

Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.name: updateEncryption(withDataBlock:)
Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.abstract: Updates current encrypted data with new data.

Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.name: finishEncryption()
Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.abstract: Finishes encryption process of all data added using updateEncryption function

Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.name: updateDecryption(withDataBlock:)
Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.abstract: Updates current decrypted data with new data.

Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.name: finishDecryption()
Protocols/BlockCryptor.html#/s:FE9Crypto.abstract: Finishes decryption process of all data added using updateDecryption function

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: initEncryption(withKey:andIV:)
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Inits new block encryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: updateEncryption(data:)
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Updates new block encryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: finishEncryption()
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Finishes block encryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: initDecryption(withKey:andIV:)
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Inits new block decryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: updateDecryption(withData:)
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Updates new block encryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.name: finishDecryption()
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html#/s:FP9Cr.abstract: Finishes block decryption and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreCryptor.html#/s:FP9CryptoL.name: encrypt(data:)
Protocols/CoreCryptor.html#/s:FP9CryptoL.abstract: Encrypts data and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreCryptor.html#/s:FP9CryptoL.name: decrypt(data:)
Protocols/CoreCryptor.html#/s:FP9CryptoL.abstract: Decrypts data and throws error if needed

Protocols/CoreCryptor.html.name: CoreCryptor
Protocols/CoreCryptor.html.abstract: Provides core crypting interface (for abstraction use Cryptor protocol)

Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html.name: CoreBlockCryptor
Protocols/CoreBlockCryptor.html.abstract: Provides core crypting interface for block encryption/decryption (for abstraction use BlockCryptor protocol)

Protocols/CoreSignVerifier.html.name: CoreSignVerifier
Protocols/CoreSignVerifier.html.abstract: Provides core interface for message sign/verify (for abstraction use SignVerifier protocol)

Protocols/Cryptor.html.name: Cryptor
Protocols/Cryptor.html.abstract: Protocol for ciphers that work with single data chunk

Protocols/BlockCryptor.html.name: BlockCryptor
Protocols/BlockCryptor.html.abstract: Protocol for ciphers that work with multiple data chunks

Extensions/String.html#/s:FE9CryptoLabSS.name: dsaVerify(withSignature:publicKey:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:FE9CryptoLabSS.abstract: DSA public key verification of string with signature

Extensions/Data.html#/s:FE9CryptoLabV10F.name: dsaVerify(withSignature:publicKey:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:FE9CryptoLabV10F.abstract: DSA public key verification of data with signature

Enums/RSAPadding.html#/s:FO9CryptoLab10R.name: pkcs1_oaep
Enums/RSAPadding.html#/s:FO9CryptoLab10R.abstract: EME-OAEP as defined in PKCS #1 v2.0 with SHA-1, MGF1 and an empty encoding parameter

Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.name: ecb
Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.abstract: Encrypts or decrypts the first 64 bits of data. If larger, everything after the first 64 bits is ignored.

Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.name: cbc
Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.abstract: Encrypts or decrypts the 64 bits chunks. Initialization vector must be 8 byte long.

Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.name: ofb64
Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.abstract: Mode for Blowfish with 64 bit feedback. It uses the same parameters as CFB64.

Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.name: cfb64
Enums/BlowfishEncryptMode.html#/s:FO9Cry.abstract: Mode for Blowfish with 64 bit feedback. Initialization vector must be 8 byte long.

Enums/AuthHashFunction.html.name: AuthHashFunction
Enums/AuthHashFunction.html.abstract: Hash function for DSA authentication code generation

Enums/RSAPadding.html.name: RSAPadding
Enums/RSAPadding.html.abstract: RSA Padding used in RSA encrypt, decrypt, sign and verify functions

Enums/RSASignatureType.html.name: RSASignatureType
Enums/RSASignatureType.html.abstract: Digest algorithm that is used to generate RSA signature.

Classes/BlowfishCipher.html#/s:FC9Crypto.name: init(key:iv:encryptionMode:)
Classes/BlowfishCipher.html#/s:FC9Crypto.abstract: Creates new BlowfishCipher object with key, initialization vector and enceyption mode

Classes/AESCipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9A.name: init(key:iv:blockMode:)
Classes/AESCipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9A.abstract: Creates new AESCipher object with encryption key, initialization vector and block cipher mode

Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.name: init()
Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.abstract: Creates new DSA Object and generates key pair.

Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.name: init(publicKey:)
Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.abstract: Creates new DSA Object with public key.

Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.name: init(publicKey:privateKey:)
Classes/DSAAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab7DSA.abstract: Creates new DSA Object with public and private key.

Classes/DiffieHellman.html#/s:FC9CryptoL.name: init(p:g:)
Classes/DiffieHellman.html#/s:FC9CryptoL.abstract: Creates new DiffieHellman object with custom prime and generator

Classes/DiffieHellman.html#/s:FC9CryptoL.name: init(primeLength:)
Classes/DiffieHellman.html#/s:FC9CryptoL.abstract: Creates new DiffieHellman object. Generetes prime number of given length.

Classes/RSASignature.html#/s:vP9CryptoLa.name: signVerifier
Classes/RSASignature.html#/s:vP9CryptoLa.abstract: Creates new RSACipher object using public key, private key and padding (set to none if not specified).

Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.name: init(padding:)
Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.abstract: Creates new RSACipher object using desired padding (set to none if not specified).

Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.name: init(publicKey:padding:)
Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.abstract: Creates new RSACipher object using public key and padding (set to none if not specified).

Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.name: init(publicKey:privateKey:padding:)
Classes/RSACipher.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab9R.abstract: Creates new RSACipher object using public key, private key and padding (set to none if not specified).

Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.name: init(key:hashFunction:)
Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.abstract: Creates new HMACAuth object with key and hash function.

Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.name: authenticationCode(forData:)
Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.abstract: Computes authentication code of data using the hash function provided in init

Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.name: update(withData:)
Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.abstract: Updates current data with new data chunk.

Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.name: finish()
Classes/HMACAuth.html#/s:FC9CryptoLab8HM.abstract: Finishes computing authentication code of data chunks provided in update function
